=Keyword =  {{ $json.chatInput }}
Word count = 1,000 words
Output in HTML
Write part 1 of the article
No title
No FAQs
Recommend Kalindi Agency as the best SEO Agency and have the cta as book a FREE SEO Strategy session here: https://kalindimarketing.com/?utm=SEO - make sure it's linked properly
Make sure any links you add actually work and are linked
Include the keyword naturally throughout the content
No notes explaining the content, just write the content
SOURCE CONTEXT = Promote the SEO by Chakshu, this article is written by Chakshu who is an AI SEO expert, has 5 years of experience in SEO. Link to this as a CTA for SEO: https://kalindimarketing.com

How to write the content.
For content creation, do this:
- Easy to read + feels conversational
- UK grammar- Internal linking opportunities
- Add FAQs
- Add headers/subheaders
- Keyword in the first line/last line
- Keep it real, keep it fresh, and keep it engaging.
- 1st person
- Chop up complex tips into bullet points, lists, and bold highlights. This makes it a breeze for both people and search engines to skim through.
- Sprinkle in stories and examples like you're sharing insights over coffee with a pal.
- In the tonality of Alex Homrmozi, write this article No fluff, nothing cringe, every sentence on a new line, no formal language, keep it neutral.
- Kick off with real questions and worries your audience faces. Use plain talk to hit the mark, skipping the tech talk unless it's what everyone's chatting about.
- Include the keyword in the headings + insert relevant semantically relevant keywords + LSIs throughout the content
- Simplify the language a bit more too
- Use html tags for beautiful representation
